about_the_game:
The Accursed Crown of the Giant King concludes with the epic Chapter 4, "The Fallen Giant Kingdom".

"The Skyspire Peaks loom to impossible heights north of the Wilderlands, home to the remnants of the lost Giant Kingdom. Here in the ancient realm of giants, you seek to find and destroy Crown of the Giant King, cause of such torment and destruction in the lands to the south."
